channel.title: Revitalize |||Updated 7-8-13||| New minigame!
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img197/8692/rbanner1.png[/img]
-[b]Introduction[/b]-
Hello Moparscape! I'm a long time lurker on this site (2006-13), and I've finally decided to make an account. I'm currently working on a server. Bare with me, I'm kind of new to the whole coding thing. I've been coding in Java for a couple months, everyone starts somewhere, correct? I'm prepared and willing to spend multiples of hours, days, weeks, to hone my skills because I want to become a programmer someday as my career. Runescape private servers have always struck a cord with me because I love reading long lines of code, even if it is ugly. All the work that went into coding all the servers stuns me. So follow me as a complete my journey of getting a working server up and off the ground!
-[b]Background[/b]-
Currently 4 months into my Java experience, I have decided to take a Project Insanity source and turn it into what will be called "Revitalize". I came up with this name because I want everyone who plays it to feel an easy-go, almost nostalgic feel to it. I want it to be fun, friendly, and a good server to just hang out, skill, and PK.
-[b]Log[/b]-
4-30-13 : Downloaded PI and started to clean up some code, getting rid of anything unnecessary. 5-1-13: Started working on a new home area, as well as getting some new shop items. 5-3-13: Working on getting all skills to function. 5-6-13: Not much work done, tried adding a zombie survival minigame for fun. 5-10-13: New home area (Varrock, woo) Added new shops creating new unique pk points system working on getting fishing complete, Will be used A LOT in this server due to most high level fish not being able to be bought. working on Edgeville, I have a unique Idea, will reveal later. Changing God Wars, original PI's method of getting kill points isn't that great. Working on fight caves. 70% done! 5-11-13: Working on Shilop's gathering system. Worked on fight caves a bit more. Need to change so you can start waves without logging in and out. Added some more items to the shops. 5-12-13: nothing major, had work today. changed some combat formulas for more realistic combat. Working on Shilop's system, as well as working on some EXP gaining adjustments. 6-5-13: got my server online! Will be posting links later this month! added more shops, better combat, better eating. 6-7-13: added a new pker npc. Starter experience rates. - almost soul split style, but with my twist 7-8-13: Added a new minigame, a shop for the minigame, and also a new point system. Corrected some animations and started working on player saving
[b]Personal Updates:[/b]
Sorry for being gone. I've had finals, and other things to deal with! But I'm back!
-[b]Media![/b]-
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/9114/rpic3.png[/img] This picture I'd particularly like to put some information on. Shilop, (in future updates) can go fish, mine, and cut wood for you. But he comes at a price, depending what you pay him, is how much he will get. I'll work this into the economy somehow so it doesn't crash because of lowered prices on important items. Feedback?
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img577/913/rpic4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img836/984/rpic5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8189/rpic9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/9669/rpic10.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/7827/rpic8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/5783/epzu.png[/img]
-[b]Suggestions[/b]- Please make some suggestions. I'm open to anything and will take it under consideration! :)
-[b]future additions![/b]- Dwarf Cannon Zombie mini game - Maybe? Castle wars pest control custom interfaces for teleporting Fun clan wars Pk points system New target system for wilderness Random drops based on EP alongside the normal player drops quests such as Recipe for disaster, tutorial island, lost city, ect.
[b]Unique Ideas[/b]
Creating a new clan wars that you earn tokens for killing people which you can spend on items. Creating a fly through tutorial of the server. Creating an extreme new player tutorial, explaining how to play. [s]Creating an npc that acts like a player, to fight in the wilderness, including different weapons, special attacks, taunts, prayers, food upto 26 slots. Etc.[/s] Done! Suggest something here!
[b]poll questions![/b] Question: Should I make non-combat skills be able to train to 120? A. no. B. yes. c. i don't care.
Question 2: Where should home be? A. Varrock B. Lumbridge C. Edgeville D. Falador
Question 3: Should I let players have God wars? Or should I keep it old school? A. God wars. B. No God wars. C. Don't care.
-[b]Closing[/b]-
Although I am new, please don't be rough, I'm still learning and having fun while doing so!
So please, follow me as I learn to make this server the best I can!
[b]Please bump this thread when you read![/b]
[b]Credits[/b]
This section is for tutorials I've used when making this server. Some are from Rune-Server, most are from here.
Faded Vision - for the base of my gambling system so far [/center]

item.title: Revitalize |||Updated 7-8-13||| New minigame!
item.dc:creator: @Revitalize Revitalize
item.description:
@Revitalize wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:31, topic:518880”]I like the fact that you are actually (or it seems that way…) that you wish to learn how ot program. I don’t doubt you can learn some things from rsps however I would like to suggest that you learn a vast majority of your programming knowledgefrom the oracle website and pure practice. If you are comparing rsps code and then recreating it you will just see some messy stuff let me tell you!

Let me know if you need a beta tester I will be glad to “give you some things to fix” ;)[/quote]

Haha, I’m actually taking a class in school on Java. I’m going through PI’s code fixing it, everything. The conventions, making it more fluent to read. Some of the processes are super long, creating a lag when used, ect. But I’m persistent in learning this. Like I said in the first post, I want to code for my career. Thanks man! And i’m sure to add you to the list of people who wanna play:) Thanks again for the post!

Read full topic

@Joesservers - Thank you man! I’m going to do the best I can for everyone
[/quote]
If you need any help you can pm me, i have nothing to do the last time so.[/quote]
Thanks! I may take you up on that, since I’m semi-new to coding.
